translations: 女武神；瓦尔基里（北欧神话中奥丁神的侍女之一）

sentences.sentence: So some Valkyries were described as a girl with wings, like a bird.
sentences.translation: 因此，一些女武神被描述为一个长着翅膀的女孩像一只鸟。

sentences.sentence: This might be the reason why the Valkyries are also called the "Battle Maidens."
sentences.translation: 这可能是女武神的原因也被称为“战斗少女。”

sentences.sentence: The Valkyries, in the guise of swans, bore their fallen heroes to the Valhalla of Norse mythology.
sentences.translation: 瓦尔基里变成一只天鹅，将战死疆场的武士接回北欧神话的瓦尔哈拉殿堂。
